Translations.Text: U si tnudda s, war ccekk: Iboahim
Mi d iusa, ar Mass is, s wul iufan
mi inna i baba s, akked ugdud is: "d acu taabdem
D ioebbiten n tkerkas, war Oebbi, ay teb$am
Acu tepmeyyizem di Mass imavalen
Iger tii ar itran
inna: "aql i ulwa
Ooan t, wexxoen
Izzi ar ioebbiten nnsen, inna: "day ur teppeppem ara
Acu ikwen iu$en, ur d tneiqem ara
Idhem fellasen, iwwet s uyeffus
U$alen d $uoes, zeeefen
Inna: "day a ppaabdem ayen tmeslem
Oebbi Ixelq ikwen, akked wayen txeddmem
Nnan: "bnut as tazeqqa, terrem t ar wu$ud
B$an ad as p andin; Nekwni Nessemei iten mavi
Inna: "nek, ad ouee$ ar Mass iw, ad iyi Iawi d ubrid
A Mass iw, £it iyi d, s iaaoviyen
Nbecceo it s tlalit n uqcic ieelmen
Mi ibda iteddu yides, inna: "a mmi! Nek wala$, di targit, a k zlu$. Muqel d acu twalav"? Inna: "a baba! Exdem ayen ik ippumoen; ad iyi tafev, ma Irad Oebbi, seg iueboiyen
D$a, mi unzen, u ieeel it $ef uniyr
Nessawel as: "a Iboahim
Tumnev s targit. Akka, ih, ay Nepkafi lauuam
Wagi, s tidep, d ajeooeb n uuee
Nefda t id, s tmezliwt tabarart
Neooa d fellas i ineggura
tifrat i Iboahim
Akka ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Neppa, s tidep, seg imdanen nne£ iumnen
Nbecceo it s Iseaq, d nnbi, seg iaaoviyen
Nburek iten, neppa d Iseaq. Si tarwa nnsen, iban win iddan d ubrid, iban win idensen iman is
Ni$ N$at Musa akked Haoun
Nsellek iten, nitni akked ugdud nnsen, si lefqaa tabarart
Nefka yasen afus, d$a d nitni ay d imerbae
Nefka yasen Tazmamt ipbegginen
Nebbwi ten d ubrid uwqim
Neooa d fellasen, i ineggura
talwit i Musa, akked Haoun
Akka, ih, ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Nitni, s tidep, seg imdanen nne£ iumnen
Ih, Ilyas ar seg imazanen
Mi inna i ugdud is: "day ur tepeezziben ara
Day la tepnujum $eo Baala, a ppeooem Uuam ixellaqen
Oebbi, Mass nnwen, Mass n lejdud nnwen imezwura
Skaddben t. S tidep, nitni a d rsen
kkes ed imdanen n Oebbi, izedganen
Neooa d fellas, i ineggura
talwit i Ilyas
Akka, ih, ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Neppa, s tidep, seg imdanen nne£ iumnen
Ih, Lui seg imazanen
Mi t Nsellek, akked twacult is, s lekmal is
siwa tam$aot, seg wid igwran
Sinna, Nemea wiyav
Aql akwen la tleeeum fellasen, deg uzal
deg yiv. Day ur tepmeyyizem ara
Ih, Yunes ar seg imazanen
Mi irwel ar sfina iccuoen
Ijbed taseqqaot, iubee ed seg wid ipwaveggoen
Isseblaa it uslem, u neppa degs tiyta
Lemmer ur illi, neppa, seg wid isbuccuaen
ad iqqim deg uaabbuv is, ar ass n tu$alin nnsen
